creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: black with off white lining, piping and machine stitching in geometric designs throughout; front yoke with frog closures; large (13 1/2 x 24") epaulettes attach to yoke and become sleeves; pouch 24" down from shoulder seam filled with straw; hanging from pouch is separate apron over single piece front flap; in back are 3 flaps hanging separately with smaller apron; on backside of pouch is stitched opening with ties
dimension: 60 x 67 in. (152.4 x 170.18 cm) (cuff to cuff)
title: Costume Armor (?)
